name: v1_convertcurrency
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool currency_converter_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Convert currencies using the latest exchange rates. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/convertcurrency.
API description: Converts an amount of currency from one type to another using the API Ninjas Convert Currency API endpoint.

amount.description: The amount of currency to convert.

have.description: The currency you currently hold. Must be a 3-character currency code (e.g., 'USD').

want.description: The currency to which you want to convert. Must be a 3-character currency code (e.g., 'EUR').
